title: How to read this?
text1:
At polypoly we are building something large and ambitious, one element at a time. And since we are building this with and for our existing and future members and partners, we want to give you a better sense of where this is going and what progress we are making.

The status icon show a process indicator. The four steps have the following meaning::
explanation1: Brainstorming leads us here. We are seriously thinking about this, but did not start working on it yet.
explanation2: Who would have known â€“ brainstorming leads to an idea and this idea needs to get in shape. Weâ€™re on it, we shape the idea for development.
explanation3: Things are getting serious. Weâ€™re currently working on bringing this to life.
explanation4: We are almost ready. The launch date is scheduledâ€¦ they grow up so fast ðŸ¥². Here are some previews.
